name: Taking a Walk on the Southside
description: Just a quick note here to introduce our newest voice on Serious Eats, Michael Nagrant. If you're not already familiar with his work, Michael's a food writer living in Chicago and also the publisher of Hungry magazine. He'll be joining...

recipeInstructions.text: Put mint in bottom of a cocktail shaker and crush with the back of a spoon or muddler to release essential oils. Add about 5 or 6 ice cubes and remaining ingredients. Shake hard for about 10 seconds or until shaker frosts to the point where the cold stings your fingertips. Strain into a martini glass.
